ch.ethz.rtc.kernel
Class CurveSegmentIterator

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.rtc.kernel.CurveSegmentIterator

public class CurveSegmentIterator
extends java.lang.Object

CurveSegmentIterator provides an iterator that iterates over the single curve segments of a curve.

Since:
Version:
$Id: CurveSegmentIterator.java 918 2008-12-23 11:38:46Z nikolays $
Author:
Ernesto Wandeler
Proposed Rating:

JUnit Rating:

Constructor Summary
CurveSegmentIterator(Curve c)
          Creates a CurveSegmentIterator that iterates over all Segments in the passed Curve.
CurveSegmentIterator(Curve c, double xMax)
          Creates a CurveSegmentIterator that iterates over all Segments in the passed Curve, up to x <= xMax.
 
Method Summary
 int index()
          Returns the index of the current Segment.
 boolean next()
          Advances this Iterator to the next Segment in the Curve and returns true if the end is not reached yet.
 void reset()
          Resets this CurveSegmentIterator.
 double s()
          Returns the slope of the current Segment.
 Segment segment()
          Returns the current Segment.
 double xEnd()
          Returns the x-value of the end of the current Segment.
 double xStart()
          Returns the x-value of the start of the current Segment.
 double yEnd()
          Returns the y-value of the end of the current Segment.
 double yStart()
          Returns the y-value of the start of the current Segment.

Constructor Detail

CurveSegmentIterator

public CurveSegmentIterator(Curve c,
                            double xMax)
Creates a CurveSegmentIterator that iterates over all Segments in the passed Curve, up to x <= xMax.

Parameters:
c - the Curve to iterate over.
xMax - the maximum value up to which to iterate.
